heist.thief

Class OrdinaryThief

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • heist.thief.OrdinaryThief
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OrdinaryThief
extends java.lang.Thread
    OrdinaryThief represents a thief active entity. Thieves enter the museum stole canvas and come back to return it to the MasterThief. Thieves attack in parties defined by the MasterThief and cannot move their comrades behind. After taking a step the thief wakes up the last thief in the Party queue to make a step.
